text.section:
While registration as an apprentice barber is in effect, the registration authorizes the individual to learn to practice barbering:
in a:
barbershop that holds a barbershop permit; or
beauty salon that holds a beauty salon permit; and
under the supervision of a master barber.

section.section: An apprentice barber shall practice barbering only at the barbershop or beauty salon with a barbershop permit issued under § 5-504 of this article.
An apprentice barber may only be paid for work authorized under this section performed while assisting a master barber in starting or completing an operation.
